trans-unit.source: Enables you to pass context properties from the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: Kunt u het doorgeven van de contexteigenschappen van de COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) in de COM +-context.

trans-unit.source: COMTI provides services for accessing the IBM Customer Information Control System (CICS) and IBM Information Management System (IMS).
trans-unit.target: COMTI biedt services voor toegang tot de IBM klant informatie besturingselement System (CICS) en IBM informatie Management System (IMS).

trans-unit.source: Essentially, COMTI provides a set of tools and services that ease the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
trans-unit.target: In principe voorziet COMTI in een set hulpprogramma's en services die het vereenvoudigt van mainframes transacties en zakelijke logica wrapping als COM-onderdelen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie over het gebruik van kenmerken [kenmerken](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"> </xref> klasse, instellen van de <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>eigenschap <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, enabling the setting of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"> </xref> klasse, het inschakelen van de instelling van de <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>eigenschap.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als de eigenschappen van de context COMTI worden doorgegeven in de COM +-context; anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) context properties are passed into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: Haalt een waarde die aangeeft of de contexteigenschappen COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) worden doorgegeven in de COM +-context.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als de eigenschappen van de context COMTI worden doorgegeven in de COM +-context; anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
